ValidationRule.description: If phone begins with +44, it cannot begin with +447 because that is a mobile number. This only applies where we do not already have a mobile number. If there is already a mobile number, we can accept a second one in the phone field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && NOT(ISPICKVAL( $User.OW_user_type__c , "Integration")) && IsPersonAccount && NOT(ISBLANK(PersonMobilePhone)) && NOT(ISBLANK(Phone)) && PersonMobilePhone = Phone
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Use a different phone number to the mobile number
